result.markdown: --- title: "\U0001F409 Introduction to R and RStudio" author: "Arvind Venkatadri" date: 14/Nov/2022 date-modified: "2023-03-13" abstract: How to use R and RStudio image: preview.png categories: - R - RStudio - Posit - Metaphors with Data and Geometry --- ## {{< fa folder-open >}} Slides and Tutorials ## Introduction to R We have already installed R and RStudio when we installed Radiant! We will now get acquainted with data and its representations in R! We will also form a view of how English Grammar ( pronouns, verbs, adjectives,figures of speech..) get **"metaphorized"** into the R World!! ## Readings - R for Data Science, Workflow: Basics Chapter: - Modern Dive, Getting Started Chapter: - R & RStudio Basics: - RStudio IDE Cheatsheet: ------------------------------------------------------------------------
